items.content_html: Leads Tracker is a lightweight Chrome extension that helps you save and organize links easily. You can manually enter URLs or save the current tab with a single click. All data is stored locally using localStorage, ensuring privacy and quick access.
items.title: TANA-7/LeadsTracker-ChromeExtension: Leads Tracker is a lightweight Chrome extension that helps you save and organize links easily. You can manually enter URLs or save the current tab with a single click. All data is stored locally using localStorage, ensuring privacy and quick access.

items.content_html: This project is a lightweight web application developed with ReactJS and TailwindCSS. It enables the visualization of 3D point cloud data and incorporates basic GIS viewing features.

items.content_html: Minerva is a lightweight art portfolio website built with JavaScript, React, and Vite, designed for fast performance and a minimalistic aesthetic. It offers a sleek, responsive platform for artists to showcase their work and effortlessly share their creative journeys online.
items.title: C-Teo/minerva: Minerva is a lightweight art portfolio website built with JavaScript, React, and Vite, designed for fast performance and a minimalistic aesthetic. It offers a sleek, responsive platform for artists to showcase their work and effortlessly share their creative journeys online.
